question.text: Last winter some friends and I went walking in some mountains, and it was a walk I will never forget. We are all experienced walkers: we [are all able to read|z] a map and use a compass, but we found ourselves in trouble.
It was a beautiful day and as we walked we [could see|z] all the other mountains around us very clearly.

params.instruct_panel_str: If you are unsure about how the animation above works click the "Instructions" button for help

question.text: It was very still and silent: the only sounds we [could hear|can hear] were our boots in the snow.
question.modelAnswerString: It was very still and silent: the only sounds we could hear were our boots in the snow.

question.text: The weather forecast was good, but weather forecasts [can be|manage to be] wrong, so we had brought warm clothes and our mobile phones, in case of an emergency.
question.modelAnswerString: The weather forecast was good, but weather forecasts can be wrong, so we had brought warm clothes and our mobile phones, in case of an emergency.

question.text: We had reached the top of the mountain and were coming down when we noticed some clouds coming towards us very fast. This meant that a storm was on its way so we began to hurry. About ten minutes later Nigel suddenly fell over and shouted out to us. He'd hurt his ankle badly and he [couldn't walk|couldn't walks] at all.
question.modelAnswerString: We had reached the top of the mountain and were coming down when we noticed some clouds coming towards us very fast. This meant that a storm was on its way so we began to hurry. About ten minutes later Nigel suddenly fell over and shouted out to us. He'd hurt his ankle badly and he couldn't walk at all.

question.text: Paul said, 'We [can't stay|couldn't stay] here. The storm will be here soon'. So Nigel put his arms on Paul and Mark's shoulders and they helped him down.
question.modelAnswerString: Paul said, 'We can't stay here. The storm will be here soon'. So Nigel put his arms on Paul and Mark's shoulders and they helped him down.

question.text: We [were able to continue|could continue] like this for about half an hour but then the storm hit us.
question.modelAnswerString: We were able to continue like this for about half an hour but then the storm hit us.

question.text: We [couldn't see |weren't allowed to see] anything because the snow was so thick. We decided to stay where we were.
question.modelAnswerString:
We couldn't see anything because the snow was so thick. We decided to stay where
we were.

question.text: Luckily, we [managed to find|could to find] a sheltered place to wait and we phoned for help.
question.modelAnswerString: Luckily, we managed to find a sheltered place to wait and we phoned for help.

question.text: We told the mountain rescue team where we were and that Nigel was injured. At this point, Nigel was very cold and tired and he [wasn't able to speak|didn't able to speak ] much.
question.modelAnswerString: We told the mountain rescue team where we were and that Nigel was injured. At this point, Nigel was very cold and tired and he wasn't able to speak much.

question.text: We gave him some more clothes and [managed to keep|managed keep ] him quite warm.
question.modelAnswerString: We gave him some more clothes and managed to keep him quite warm.

question.text: The rescue team came an hour later. [They were able to carry |They could carry ] Nigel off the mountain on a stretcher and take him to hospital. It was a great relief to see him later sitting up in bed smiling!
question.modelAnswerString: The rescue team came an hour later. They were able to carry Nigel off the mountain on a stretcher and take him to hospital. It was a great relief to see him later sitting up in bed smiling!
